name: Transference Charm
description: A spiritual charm that transports the user to a place they've already visited. To use it, one must write their destination on the card.
effect: Only usable out of combat. You instantly move to a place within a 30km radius that you have already visited (Consult with the GM for details). This consumable is only usable once per session.

name: Transformation Drug
description: A spiritual drug that allows the user to change gender to disguise themselves. It's sold exclusively by Sumizuka Pharmaceutical and typically purchased by intelligence agents from various countries.
effect: Only usable out of combat. Once per session, the target can change their gender. Treat this gender swap as a disguise check with a result of 15.

name: Shinmyo Charm
description: A spiritual charm that determines the God Name of a hostile awakened in the user's presence. It's used by holding it up and filling it with spirit energy.
effect: The user may perform an identify check on one target within the combat zone.

name: Data Card
description: A disposable microdisk that amplifies the effects of spell programs.
effect: Use as it on yourself as Unique Timing during damage calculation. Gain +2d6 to damage while using a Digital Sorcerer restricted weapon. This consumable is only usable once per round.

name: Address
description: Notes or data containing the contact information of a specific person.
effect: Only usable while out of combat. Once per session, the user gains one bond with any NPC. This consumable is only usable once per session.

name: Information Shop
description: An informant or shop that can give contact information for those "in the know" of supernatural incidents.
effect: Only usable while out of combat in the Struggle Rules. Once per session, the user rolls on the Event Table 1 and chooses the result.

name: Elixir of Power
description: A magical drug that allows its user to exhibit greater supernatural power.
effect: Use it on your own Main Stat checks as Unique Timing. You gains +2 to the result of your Strength checks.

name: Elixir of Agility
description: A magical drug that allows its user to exhibit high supernatural agility.
effect: Use it on your own Main Stat checks as Unique Timing. You gain +2 to the result of your Agility checks.

name: Elixir of Wisdom
description: A magical drug that allows its user to exhibit amazing intelligence.
effect: Use it on your own Main Stat checks as Unique Timing. You gain +2 to the result of your Intellect checks.

name: Elixir of Wisdom
description: A magical drug that allows its user to exhibit tremendous mental strength and concentration.
effect: Use it on your own Main Stat checks as Unique Timing. You gain +2 to the result of your Will checks.

name: Elixir of Fortune
description: A magical drug that grants strong luck to the awakened.
effect: Use it on your own Main Stat checks as Unique Timing. You gain +1 to the result of your Luck checks.

name: Ether Tablets
description: A tranquilizer created from purified spirit energy.
effect: Use it on yourself as Unique Timing. You adjust one Spirit Dice by +2 or -2. This effect cannot change a dice to a value higher than 6 or lower than 1, and is usable once per session.

name: Acceleration Charm
description: A charm or tag that temprarily increases athletic ability.
effect: Use it on yourself as Unique Timing. Increases the Speed of your Move actions by +1. Usable once per session.

name: C4
description: Special plastic explosives converted into an Artificial Regalia.
effect: Use as [Timing: Prep / Range: 7 Sq. / Target: 1#]. The user may destroy an obstacle within range. Additionally, any target adjacent to the obstacle become staggered.

name: Barrier Stone
description: A spiritual stone that can project a special barrier
effect: Use it on yourself as Unique Timing. You recieves -2d6 damage from an attack action with two or more targets, including Area or Combat Zone. Usable once per session.

name: Tranquilizer
description: A tranquilizer created from highly purified spirit energy.
effect: Use it on yourself as Unique Timing. Increase the number of spirit dice you have by 1, and adjusts the rolled Spirit Dice by +2 or -2. This effect cannot change a dice to a value higher than 6 or lower than 1, and is usable once per session.

name: Portable AED
description: A portable AED that can revive its target with a powerful shock.
effect: Use on one engaged target. The target is no longer downed, and they set their HP to 15. The target may refuse this effect.

name: Acceleration Capsule
description: A charm or tag that temporarily increases athletic ability.
effect: Use on your Start Timing. You increase your Initiative by +2d6 until the End Timing of the next round. Usable once per session.

name: Letter of Introduction
description: A referral needed to switch between awakened organizations.
effect: Change your organization or faction to any affiliated one. When you do, any items restricted to your original organization in your possession are automatically sold. Usable once per session.
